node.name: Good interview question for keys
node.rich_text: In React, keys are used to uniquely identify elements in a list. This helps React optimize the rendering process by efficiently updating and reordering elements. Hereâ€™s a concise explanation you can use in an interview:
Why do we use keys in React?
: Keys help React identify which items have changed, been added, or removed. 2.
: By using keys, React can match elements between renders and only update the changed elements, improving performance. 3.
: Without keys, React would re-render all elements in a list, which is inefficient.
